concept.title: LZO and Snappy Compression
concept.shortdesc: You can use LZO or Snappy compression with the Hadoop FS and HBase destinations. You can use Snappy compression with the Cassandra destination.

conbody.p: destinationsLZO and Snappy compressionLZO compressionfor some destinationsSnappy compressionfor some destinationsTo use LZO or Snappy compression with Hadoop FS or HBase, you need to configure the to enable LZO or Snappy compression.
You can use Snappy compression with Cassandra without any additional configuration.

Due to JVM limitations, you can use LZO or Snappy compression with only one version of Hadoop FS and HBase. The Hadoop FS and HBase destinations are installed together in a library version. If you installed multiple library versions, make sure to configure the to use compression with the version that you want to use.
